value.name: Complete the Ampt tutorial
value.description: Complete the Ampt tutorial in the CLI

value.name: Check out the Ampt docs
value.description: Visit Ampt's website and read the docs at https://getampt.com/docs

value.name: Uncomment the request logger on line 47 of index.tsx
value.description: With Ampt, changes are synced instantly to your sandbox, and live logs are displayed in the Ampt shell. Uncomment the request logger to see it in action.

value.name: Import test data using the Ampt CLI
value.description: Use the import command to load in test data into @ampt/data
